channel.title: Visualization on Robert Myles McDonnell

item.title: Women in Power
item.description: library(dplyr); library(readxl) ## Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 3.4.2 columns <- c("Country", "Overall Index", "Overall Rank", "Economic Participation & Opportunity", "Eco Rank", "Educational Attainment", "Edu Rank", "Health and Survival", "Health Rank", "Political Empowerment", "Poli Rank") df <- read_excel("/Users/robert/Downloads/WEF_GGGR_Dataset_2016.xlsx", sheet = 2, skip = 3, col_names = columns) library(ggplot2); library(tidyr); library(extrafont) ## Registering fonts with R #font_import() #loadfonts() df %>% ggplot(aes(x = `Health and Survival`)) + geom_density() df %>% gather(key = "Index Type", value = "Value", `Economic Participation & Opportunity`, `Educational Attainment`, `Health and Survival`, `Political Empowerment`) %>% { ggplot(.
